projectGridLines.stationName: Siemens EDA (Formerly Mentor Graphics) - Digital, Noida/Bengaluru
projectGridLines.title: Digital
projectGridLines.description:
·        Digital Profile Siemens EDA provides a unique blend of an opportunity to work on latest technology combining both hardware and software to come up with innovative solutions. It involves research and explorations, while working on industrial standard protocols such as PCIe, USB, HDMI etc.

·        We are looking for students with the passion and capability for creating novel synthesizable verification IPs using a combination of analytical, hardware, digital and software skills. The internship project will help students to get real time industry exposure in EDA field and help creating fabulous future ahead.
